column4: Short sellers ramp up bets against Tesla  SolarCity shares: S3 Partners

column4: Short sellers ramp up bets against Tesla  SolarCity shares -S3 Partners

column4: Fitch: Brexit Will Be Costly  Disruptive for US Global Banks
column5: (The following statement was released by the rating agency) NEW YORK  June 28 (Fitch) The UK's decision to leave the European Union will be  disruptive for US global banks with significant operations in the UK and will  weigh on their profitability in the short to medium term  Fitch Ratings says.  However  the impact is likely to be moderate as we believe they will be able to  operate through other EU legal entities.
